description: Cost, Insurance and Freight - Seller pays for cost, insurance and freight to the named port of destination
sellerResponsibilities: Deliver goods to the ship at port of shipment
Pay for freight to destination port
Arrange and pay for minimum insurance coverage
Provide commercial invoice and packing list
buyerResponsibilities: Arrange transport from port to final destination
Bear all risks after goods cross ship's rail
riskTransferPoint: When goods cross the ship's rail at port of shipment
commonUseCases: Buyer wants minimal responsibility at origin

description: Free On Board - Seller delivers when goods pass the ship's rail at the named port of shipment
sellerResponsibilities: Deliver goods to the ship at port of shipment
Provide commercial invoice and packing list
Bear all costs until goods cross ship's rail
riskTransferPoint: When goods cross the ship's rail at port of shipment

description: Ex Works - Seller makes goods available at their premises. Buyer responsible for all transport
sellerResponsibilities: Make goods available at named premises
Assist with export documentation if requested
riskTransferPoint: When goods are made available at seller's premises
commonUseCases: Buyer has complete control over logistics
